subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin, 16, turned in a smooth final run on a choppy course to win the slalom race at the United States championships in Winter Park, Colo.
snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin, 16, turned in a smooth final run on a choppy course to win the slalom race at the United States championships in Winter Park, Colo.
